pr_title: Shutting down h2 connection if there's an I/O error on the streams.

timeline.author: millems

timeline.bodyText: Nit: can we put the instanceof checks in a separate method so that this line is easier to read? I struggled a little.
timeline.author: millems

timeline.bodyText: Nit: closeToNewStreams()? The other methods refer to them as 'streams', so that'd be more consistent.
timeline.author: millems

timeline.message: When there is an I/O error on an http2 request, the SDK will start shutting down the connection - stopping using the http2 connection for new requests and closing it after all streams are finished.
